UPDATE SNP_TECHNO SET GET_DATE_REQUEST = 'SELECT DISTINCT(NOW()) FROM SYSTEM_ALLTYPEINFO' WHERE I_TECHNO = 23999
UPDATE SNP_TECHNO SET DDL_LONGRAW_MASK = 'BYTEA' WHERE I_TECHNO =44999 AND DDL_LONGRAW_MASK IS NULL
UPDATE SNP_TECHNO SET DDL_LONGRAW_MASK = 'BYTEA' WHERE I_TECHNO =39999 AND DDL_LONGRAW_MASK IS NULL
UPDATE SNP_TECHNO SET DDL_LONGRAW_MASK = 'VARBINARY' WHERE I_TECHNO =23999 AND DDL_LONGRAW_MASK IS NULL
UPDATE SNP_TECHNO SET DDL_LONGRAW_MASK = 'LONGBLOB' WHERE I_TECHNO =17999 AND DDL_LONGRAW_MASK IS NULL
UPDATE SNP_TECHNO SET DDL_LONGRAW_MASK = 'IMAGE' WHERE I_TECHNO =10999 AND DDL_LONGRAW_MASK IS NULL
UPDATE SNP_TECHNO SET DDL_LONGRAW_MASK = 'IMAGE' WHERE I_TECHNO =9999 AND DDL_LONGRAW_MASK IS NULL
UPDATE SNP_TECHNO SET DDL_LONGRAW_MASK = 'IMAGE' WHERE I_TECHNO =6999 AND DDL_LONGRAW_MASK IS NULL
UPDATE SNP_TECHNO SET DDL_LONGRAW_MASK = 'BYTEA' WHERE I_TECHNO =5999 AND DDL_LONGRAW_MASK IS NULL
UPDATE SNP_TECHNO SET DDL_LONGRAW_MASK = 'BLOB(2G)' WHERE I_TECHNO =4999 AND DDL_LONGRAW_MASK IS NULL
UPDATE SNP_TECHNO SET DDL_LONGRAW_MASK = 'BLOB(2G)' WHERE I_TECHNO =3999 AND DDL_LONGRAW_MASK IS NULL
UPDATE SNP_TECHNO SET DDL_LONGRAW_MASK = 'LONG RAW' WHERE I_TECHNO =1999 AND DDL_LONGRAW_MASK IS NULL
UPDATE SNP_TECHNO SET DDL_LONGRAW_MASK = 'VARCHAR(1)' WHERE DDL_LONGRAW_MASK IS NULL
